predicate.note: Frames file for 'readjust' based on sentences in ECTB. No VN entry.

example.name: transitive
example.text: He said , on the contrary , that China , under the premise of [*] strengthening its financial risk prevention and control , will increase capital utilization benefits and support [*] developing State - owned enterprise as targets , adhere to [*] not changing reforms utilizing foreign capital , and at the same time will suitably re-adjust and perfect the policies of [*] utilizing foreign capital .
example.arg: the policies of [*] utilizing foreign capital
